channel.title: [URGENT!]How do I host a server on a MAC?
channel.description: Please, help. I really want to start a server but i dont have my netbook yet :|. It comes in November 6th but I cant wait, I want to start coding and hosting my server already. Anybody know how to host/run a server on a Mac OSX? If you help, i will give rep++ & i will love you :P

item.title: [URGENT!]How do I host a server on a MAC?
item.dc:creator: @NotoriouzBoi NotoriouzBoi
item.description:
@NotoriouzBoi wrote:

Hmm, can you toss me a test server so i can try? I mean, like a source. Pali? Espeon? Etc? Will it be able to handle some of the commands? .Bat and Shell is different.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2009, 01:48:48 pm[/size][hr]Sorry for double post but please, Anyone? I really need help -_-

Read full topic
